OOC: I have changed the thread title for the minions.


> Lamia nooded and she Looked towards the maximal base, soom that will belong to Unicrom too.

Marauder flew on, his wings pushing them powerfully through the air.
It was not as if he couldn't have used thrusters, but there was
something about flying like this that he found soothing. He carried
Lamia in one of his claws, carefully cradling her so she wouldn't be
damaged.

"Soon we will be back to the place where I was born." he said, his
voice easily carrying past the rush of wind that whipped over them as
they flew. "And there we will gather the rest of us as we find them."

As they flew, in the distance the red fire of volcanic eruptions could
just be made out in the distance. Smoke and ash plumed above like some
dark storm.

He laughed as he flew, "Yes my dear Lamia, we will bring them all home!"

(TAG)

Preston
